file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-50-09-04 - EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGEMENT SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGEMENT SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGEMENT SWITCH 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the external steering disengagement switch. B. To get access to the external steering disengagement switch, you must open access door 123AL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH EX- TERNAL STEERING EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGE- 32-50-09-000-801-A DISENGAGEMENT MENT SWITCH - REMOVAL SWITCH AIRCRAFT WITH EX- TERNAL STEERING EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGE- 32-50-09-400-801-A DISENGAGEMENT MENT SWITCH - INSTALLATION SWITCH EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-50-09 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-50-09-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGEMENT SWITCH 2. EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGEMENT SWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the external steering disengagement switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION External steering disengagement switch 123 123AL compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE External steering disengagement switch 1 Does the task compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the STEER circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open access door 123AL of the external steering disengagement switch compartment (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (1) and washers (2). (2) Release the switch panel (3) and get access to the electrical connector. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-50-09 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Disconnect the switch panel electrical connector (4). (4) Remove the switch panel (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-50-09 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGEMENT SWITCH External Steering Disengagement Switch - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ACCESS 123 AL 1 5. SHIM WASHER (4) 1. SCREW (4) 2. WASHER (4) 4. ELECTRICAL 3. SWITCH PANEL CONNECTOR DET. A 1 AIRCRAFT WITH SHIM WASHER 145AMM320355.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-50-09 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-50-09-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGEMENT SWITCH 3. EXTERNAL STEERING DISENGAGEMENT SWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for installation of the external steering disengagement switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION External steering disengagement switch 123 123AL compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) As nec- MIL-L-87177 Lektro-Tech Super Corr-B-12350 essary G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE External steering disengagement switch 1 Does the task compartment 1 Does the check In the cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the switch panel electrical connector (4) to the compartment connector. NOTE: Before the installation of the connector, apply the Lektro-Tech Super Corr- B-12350 into the plug connector to prevent corrosion and to clean the contacts. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-50-09 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Put the switch panel (3) on its correct installation position. (3) Install the screws (1) and washers (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the STEER circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (2) Do the following check: (a) Set the external switch to the "DISENGAGED" position. 1 Make sure that the STEER INOP message on the EICAS comes into view. (b) Set the external switch to the "ENGAGED" position and push the steering handle. 1 Make sure that the STEER INOP message on the EICAS goes out of view. (c) Set the external steering-disengagement-switch to the DISENGAGED position. Make sure that the STEER INOP message on the EICAS comes into view. (d) Close the external steering-disengagement-switch compartment door 123AL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) and push the steering handle. 1 Make sure that the STEER INOP message on the EICAS comes into view. 2 If the STEER INOP message is still shown on the EICAS, add the shim washer (5), as necessary. Refer to (Figure 401). After that, do the steps (a) and (b) again. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-50-09 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
